entry.title: Tarrison TSG - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tarrison
Type: BBQ
Price: 2394.00 - 4162.00 (8 variants)

Tarrison's TSG series is a part of their BUBBA Q line, which offers a powerful range of gourmet grills constructed with quality materials, and available for either natural gas or propane. Sizes range from a 36" grilling surface, to a 72" surface. They have up to 180,000 BTU of output per hour and individually-controlled burners, and accessories are available separately.

      • Natural gas or propane
      • Stainless steel construction and exterior
      • 90,000-180,000 BTU
      • 24"-72" cooking surface
      • Cross-over ignition system
      • Two 10" pneumatic wheels, two locking swivel casters

OPTIONAL ACCESSORIES

Side Shelf (for any grill)
Rotisserie Kit (for 36" grill only)
Front Shelf (for any grill)
Griddle Pan (for any grill)
Wind Guard (for 48" grill or smaller)
Smoke Hood (48" or smaller)

entry.title: Crown Verity - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 2218.00 - 5848.00 (26 variants)

This is Crown Verity's main line of commercial outdoor BBQs. They come in five different sizes and can be ordered with different packages and accessories, making them perfect for any kind of restaurant, patio, or clubhouse -- or for the professional domestic chef who wants to show off to his neighbours. You can order these grills in either liquid propane or natural gas.

These BBQs have all been designed with high-quality 304 stainless steel (as compared to 430 stainless steel), so they are incredibly durable and easy to clean. The burners are 15,000 BTU per hour and are placed every 5.75" to ensure even cooking. The stainless steel burners carry a 10 year warranty, and the cooking grills carry a lifetime warranty.

For options and accessories -- the accessories packages for the 30" and 36" grills include a roll dome, removable end shelf, adjustable bun rack, and a cover. The wind guard packages include wind guards. And the roll dome packages include a roll dome and bun rack. Please note, the pictures shown are for illustration purposes only. The actual product may vary due to product enhancement and accessories.

      • Made in Canada
      • Gas grill constructed of 304 stainless steel including grids, burners and all fasteners
      • Deep, 21" cooking surface
      • 15,000 BTU per hour stainless steel burners
      • Two 14" wheels and two total lock casters
      • Ready to use: ships completely assembled on a skid
      • Tank holder(s) on back of unit that hold 20 lb propane tank(s)
      • Storage shelf and angled legs for rock solid durability
      • Includes water pans with drain ports to ease cleaning and help eliminate grease fires from occurring
      • 16 gauge stainless steel radiants that remain in place during transportation and cleaning

SPECS

30" grill

Models CV-MCB-3, CV-MCB-30NG, CV-MCB-30PKG, CV-MCB-30PKGNG

entry.title: Omcan GR-CN-0914 - 36" Propane Mobile Commercial Outdoor Griddle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Omcan
Type: BBQ
Price: 805.00

The Omcan GR-CN-0914 outdoor propane griddle is great for both commercial venues and domestic use. With four, independently controlled burners each producing a total of 12,000 BTUs, this griddle can cook sausages, bacon, eggs, pancakes, and burgers!

The griddle top is 36" x 20" thick and provides even heat distribution. It comes equipped with splash guards that help to prevent grease splashes. Its electronic ignition ensures a quick start, and its foldable side tables and mobile casters make it easy to transport and store.

      • Four independently controlled burners
      • 48,000 total BTUs
      • 36" x 20" griddle top
      • Foldable side shelves
      • Electronic ignition
      • Mobile casters
      • Liquid propane

entry.title: Crown Verity - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Griddle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 2532.00 - 5090.00 (10 variants)

Crown Verity's series of outdoor mobile griddles have been designed to cook high volumes of products in a short period of time and have been built to convert with ease into a charbroiler for dual function use. These griddles have been constructed of 5/16" cold rolled steel with stainless steel splash guards and a removable stainless steel grease tray.

This griddle has been constructed out of high-quality 304 stainless steel (as compared to less-durable 430). It has 15,000 BTU-per-hour stainless steel burners that are evenly placed every 5.75" to ensure even eating, and the griddle can heat up to cooking temperature in 5 minutes. The burners carry a 10 year warranty.

Each model includes built-in tank holders that accommodate standard 20 pound propane tanks. You can order these griddles as either liquid propane or natural gas.

      • Gas griddles constructed of 304 stainless steel including bodies, burners and all fasteners
      • Deep, 21" cooking surface
      • 15,000 BTUH stainless steel burners
      • Two 14" wheels and two total lock casters
      • Ready to use: ships completely assembled on a skid
      • Tank holder(s) on back of unit that hold 20 pound propane tank(s)
      • Storage shelf and angled legs for rock solid durability
      • Includes water pans with drain ports to ease cleaning and help eliminate grease fires from occurring
      • 16 gauge stainless steel radiants that remain in place during transportation and cleaning
      • Pro griddle plates(s) with stainless steel splash guard and removable grease tray(s)
      • Lifetime warranty on body and 10 years on burners

entry.title: Crown Verity - Towable Commercial Outdoor Grill - 46" grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 9557.00 - 16580.00 (3 variants)

Crown Verity's series of towable outdoor "tailgate" grills allow you to tow up your BBQ to the venue and then fire up the large cooking area with six independently operated burners. You have three models to choose from. Each model has a cooking surface of 46" by 21".

The first model (TG-1) comes with two insulated storage compartments. The second model (TG-2) has no storage compartments. And the third model (TG-4) comes with a front storage compartment, two insulated storage compartments (like the TG-1), and a portable hot water dispenser and a single hand sink.

The grill bodies, cooking grates, burners, radiants, water pans, fasteners, and pilot tubes are all constructed of 304 series stainless steel for durability and ease of cleaning. Compared to units made of metal or 430 stainless steel, these units are built to last.

15,000 BTUH stainless steel burners are placed every 5.75" to ensure the most even heat pattern possible. These units heat up to cooking temperature within 5 minutes. The stainless steel burners and cooking grills carry a 10 year and lifetime warranty, respectively.

      • Made in Canada
      • 48" Gas grill constructed of 304 stainless steel including side shelves, trim, storage compartments, grids, burners and all fasteners
      • Deep, 21" cooking surface
      • 15,000 BTUH stainless steel burners
      • Holds two 30 pound propane tanks (not included)
      • TG-1 and TG-4 include two insulated storage compartments
      • Includes water pan with drain ports to ease cleaning and help eliminate grease fires from occurring
      • 16 gauge stainless steel radiants that remain in place during transportation and cleaning
      • Trailer conforms to all applicable motor vehicle safety standards
      • 1 year parts and labor limited warranty
      • Lifetime warranty on body and cooking grids and 10 years on burners

entry.title: Crown Verity BM-60 - 60" Commercial Charcoal Grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 833.00

The Crown Verity BM-60 is a 60" commercial charcoal grill for real charcoal enthusiasts. It is a heavy duty unit constructed from 14- and 16-gauge cold-rolled steel, with a high-heat enamel finish. It includes quick-release removable legs on casters, and it offers a massive five feet of grilling space. The simple slide-action grate provides three height options for the grilling surface, for increased cooking temperature control. 

      • Designed for the rental industry and caterers
      • Cool touch handles on either end
      • Deep, 24" cooking surface
      • Raised grate lip to keep items on the grill
      • Long-lasting pin-system used on legs (not threads which are easily damaged)
      • 4 Swivel casters, 2 are lockable
      • Double-gusset support on each leg for sturdiness
      • Heavy duty 14- and 16-gauge cold rolled steel
      • High heat enamel finish
      • Quick release removable legs on casters
      • Five feet of grilling space
      • Buy Canadian! Made in Ontario! Buy quality and support the economy

Crown Verity's portable grills have been designed for caterers and rental applications. These grills are stackable for easy storage and transport.

These grills have been designed with protective crash bars on each side of the grill, and there are two crash bars on the front of the gill, which will keep the knobs and body of the grill safe during transportation. This grill has been designed with a high quality 304 stainless steel for durability and ease of cleaning. Compared to units made of metal or 430 stainless steel, these units are built to last.

entry.title: Crown Verity - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Grill - Mobile Club Series
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 5354.00 - 7506.00 (6 variants)

Crown Verity's Mobile Club Series has been built for the large caterer, golf club, and hotel. These grills are perfect for longer days and nights, because you won't have to worry about changing out your propane tank. It comes with two 50 pound vertical propane tanks, a remote propane cart, and two 25 foot disconnect gas hoses, giving you everything you need in one complete package. You can order this outdoor grill as 60" or 72", and with a roll dome and bun rack, or with windguards.

This commercial grill has been designed with high quality 304 stainless steel. Compared to 430, this is going to give you added durability, longevity, and it's going to be be much easier to keep clean and looking great.

The burners are each 15,000 BTUs per hour, and are evenly spaced every 5.75" to give you a very even cook and quick heat up (the grill can heat up within 5 minutes). The stainless steel burners have a 10 year warranty and the cooking grids have a lifetime warranty. Please note, the pictures shown are for illustration purposes only. The actual product may vary due to product enhancements and accessories.

Crown Verity's Club Series has been designed specifically for country clubs, incorporating two 30 pound horizontal propane tanks, which improves the overall appearance of the grill and allows the unit to be used in a buffet line to serve customers.

The heavy duty brackets secure the propane tanks in place, and they've been designed to make placement and removal of the tanks effortless. The grill bodies, legs, cooking grates, burners, under shelves, radiants, water pans, fasteners, pilot tubes are all constructed of 304 series stainless steel for durability and ease of cleaning. entry.title: Crown Verity - Mobile Commercial Outdoor Grill - Pro Series, Rental Grill
entry.summary:
Vendor: Crown Verity
Type: BBQ
Price: 2906.00 - 5848.00 (18 variants)

Crown Verity's Pro Series of outdoor mobile grills has been designed specifically for the catering and rental markets. Compared to their standard mobile grills, these have been reinforced with double crash bars to protect the valves and knobs from being damaged during transportation, and they have handles built on each end. These outdoor grills are perfect for large scale events and companies who need to move their grill from place to place.

The Pro Series of grills comes in three different sizes: the 48", 60", and 72". And each size can be purchased standard or with a package. The roll dome package come with roll domes and bun racks and the wind guard packages come with wind guards.

These rental grills are only available in liquid propane. Each model will include two stage regulators and hoses and built-in tank holders that accommodate standard 20 pound propane tanks. Optionally, you can order the grill with a single gas connection and a 25 foot quick-disconnect hose to use with a remote tank. Please note, the pictures shown are for illustration purposes only. The actual product may vary due to product enhancement and accessories.
